The Wasteland Tribes

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Settings Home

Wiki Home

The Wasteland Tribes are not a kingdom. In fact they are not any one specific peoples, instead they are a name collectively applied to many rogue tribes which roam some of the northern territories and the waste lands to the west. They are mostly small groups but very hardened by difficult conditions and are fearsome warriors.

Not all of the Wasteland Tribes are aggressive. Some have settled into small village communities in less hospitable regions and are very open to bartering and trade. Most of the goods they sell are weapons which they usually exchange for important food variety, hides, and other useful raw materials.


Future

Survivors of Vaern

In the future, the Survivors of Vaern are a loan beacon of stability in a distraught and wrecked world. Their remote location and self sufficiency have helped them subsist... for now.

Past

Survivors of Vaern

The survivors of Vaern are a group with no allegiance to any of the three main kingdoms. They are probably the largest and best organized of all the rogue tribes of the Northern Territories. More on them will be forthcoming.
